home.title: Golden Lion Football Academy
home.subtitle: From Grassroots to Greatness
home.description: Premier youth football development in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Building champions through courage, leadership, and teamwork.

programs.title: Our Programs
programs.subtitle: Age-appropriate training for every young athlete

stage1.name: Stage 1: Education
stage1.focus: Introduction to football fundamentals and education with focus on fun and basic skills development.
stage1.schedule: Every Saturday & Sunday 8:00 am to 9:00 am

stage2.name: Stage 2: Foundation
stage2.focus: Building core football skills with emphasis on technique, teamwork, and sportsmanship.
stage2.schedule: Every Saturday & Sunday 8:00 am to 9:00 am

stage3.name: Stage 3: Training
stage3.focus: Advanced training for competitive play with tactical understanding and match preparation.
stage3.schedule: Every Saturday & Sunday 9:00 am to 10:00 am

stage4.name: Stage 4: Post-training
stage4.focus: Professional-level training for talented players with individualized development plans.
stage4.schedule: Every Saturday & Sunday 9:00 am to 10:00 am

news.title: News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest news, match results, and announcements

gallery.title: Photo Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Explore moments from training sessions, matches, and academy events

shop.title: Golden Lion Shop
shop.subtitle: Get your official Golden Lion football uniforms and gear

about.title: About GLFA
about.mission: Golden Lion Football Academy is dedicated to developing young footballers through world-class training, character building, and competitive opportunities. Located in Phnom Penh, we serve families across Cambodia and the region.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.location1Address: Preah Sisowath High School, Phnom Penh
contact.location2Address: Hero Sports (Chomkar Doung), Prey Sa, Phnom Penh
